about_the_game:
Bite Size Terrors:

Are Short Experimental Horror Experiences each with their own Unique Genres and Styles.
From the Creator of Notebook Entries, this is...

GuyGuyToys:

  • SHORT. 1 HR of Gameplay With High Detail.
  • A Fun Freaky Horror.
  • From it's moments of Spoops & Fun to a Horrifying Descent.
  • Work at a Toy Warehouse, that emphasizes on FUN. Delivering packages will never be boring!
  • Carefully Designed Sound Design & Voice Acting.

Story:

As a new employee recruited into GuyGuy Toys, you learn the basics at the Training Warehouse.
Alone with Amy, the Facilities A.I, you go through the ropes on finding, packaging & delivering.
As time passes in your shift, Amy starts to act a bit..
Different.

Gameplay:

Find, Ship and Deliver Toys.
Use the Multiple Toys to assist you on your journey.
As you do, things start to dive into Horror..r.rr.r.

name: Bite Size Terrors: GuyGuy Toys

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or I7 Equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 960 GTX/AMD RX 570
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X Eight-Core Processor or I7 Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1660 GTX/ AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to GUYGUY Toys! As the new Employee, I hope you..you..you.. Learn How to Deliver Toys Happily!
